org.forgerock.openam.upgrade.steps

Interface UpgradeStep

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEntitlementUpgradeStep, AbstractUpgradeStep, AllowEvaluateForAgentsUpgradeStep, CopyJavaCryptoExtKeyStoreStep, DelegationConfigUpgradeStep, EnableGenericRepoStep, MakeExplicitDefaultKeyStoreTypeStep, MigrateAgentGroups, MigrateValidGotoSetting, OldPolicyConditionMigrationUpgradeStep, PostAuthenticationPluginUpgradeStep, RemoveNetscapeLDAPStep, RemoveRedundantDefaultApplication, RemoveReferralsStep, RemoveSessionServiceSubSchemaStep, ResavePoliciesStep, ResourceSetPolicyUrlUpgradeStep, SchemaXmlAttributeUpgradeStep, ScriptedAuthModulesStep, ScriptingSchemaStep, TwoStepVerificationSettingUpgrade, UmaApplicationSubjectsStep, UpdateOAuth2PolicySetsStep, UpgradeAgentServiceStep, UpgradeAuditServiceStep, UpgradeCTSMaxConnectionsConfigurationStep, UpgradeDirectoryContentStep, UpgradeEntitlementsStep, UpgradeEntitlementSubConfigsStep, UpgradeExternalCTSConfigurationStep, UpgradeIdRepoSubConfigs, UpgradeLDAPAuthModulesStep, UpgradeOAuth2AuthModulesStep, UpgradeOAuth2ClientStep, UpgradeOAuth2ProviderStep, UpgradeResourceTypeStep, UpgradeServerDefaultsStep, UpgradeServiceSchemaStep

    public interface UpgradeStep
    This interface defines the methods that needs to be implemented for an upgrade step. Non-abstract implementations must have the @UpgradeStepInfo annotation.
    Author:
    Peter Major

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDetailedReport(String delimiter)
      Generates a detailed upgrade report suitable for reviewing changes.
      String getShortReport(String delimiter)
      Returns a short report for this upgrade step that should be suitable for the upgrade screen.
      void initialize()
      Initializes the upgrade step during which it determines what sort of changes needs to be applied to the configurationif any.
      boolean isApplicable()
      Tells whether this given upgrade step is applicable for this version/configuration of OpenAM.
      void perform()
      Performs the required changes for this upgrade step.

    • Method Detail

      • isApplicable

        boolean isApplicable()
        Tells whether this given upgrade step is applicable for this version/configuration of OpenAM.
        Returns:
        true if this upgrade step needs to be performed.

      • initialize

        void initialize()
         throws UpgradeException
        Initializes the upgrade step during which it determines what sort of changes needs to be applied to the configurationif any.
        Throws:
        UpgradeException - If there was an error while determining the required changes.

      • perform

        void perform()
      throws UpgradeException
        Performs the required changes for this upgrade step.
        Throws:
        UpgradeException - If there was an error while upgrading the configuration.

      • getShortReport

        String getShortReport(String delimiter)
        Returns a short report for this upgrade step that should be suitable for the upgrade screen.
        Parameters:
        delimiter - The delimiter to use between lines.
        Returns:
        The short upgrade report.

      • getDetailedReport

        String getDetailedReport(String delimiter)
        Generates a detailed upgrade report suitable for reviewing changes.
        Parameters:
        delimiter - The delimiter to use between lines.
        Returns:
        The detailed upgrade report.
